## Container.batchRegister() method

Batch register components

**Signature:**

```typescript
batchRegister(components: {
        target: Function;
        identifier?: string;
        options?: ObjectDefinitionOptions;
    }[], batchOptions?: {
        preProcessDependencies?: boolean;
        warmupAOP?: boolean;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  components | { target: Function; identifier?: string; options?: [ObjectDefinitionOptions](./koatty_container.objectdefinitionoptions.md)<!-- -->; }\[\] | The components to register |
|  batchOptions | { preProcessDependencies?: boolean; warmupAOP?: boolean; } | _(Optional)_ The batch options |

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```ts
container.batchRegister([UserService, UserRepository], { preProcessDependencies: true, warmupAOP: true });
```
